content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, how nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am looking for the highest price possible. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm seeking the lowest price for renting the apartment as a student following moral standards. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
